verbs.description: summer 2018 [V: will] feel hotter for longer in se michigan no one was thinking summer weather a couple weeks ago but so the saying goes if you do n't like the weather in michigan wait 15 minutes less than two weeks after our last snow we hit the mid 80s summer la nina climate prediction center
